item.title: 芝加哥利用 Loop Capital 创始人弥补 10 亿美元预算缺口
item.description: Loop Capital 创始人吉姆-雷诺兹（Jim Reynolds）将与他人共同领导一个由芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）成立的工作小组，为该市寻找弥补赤字的方法。【原文：Loop Capital founder Jim Reynolds​​​​ will co-lead a working group established by Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson to find ways for the city to close its deficits that are projected to top $1 billion in each of the next two years.】

item.title: 中美贸易停战将提振亚洲股市：市场综述
item.description: 中美关税放松后，华尔街风险偏好反弹，这将延续到周二的亚洲交易。【原文：Wall Street’s rebound in risk appetite following the easing of US-China tariffs is poised to spill into Asia trading Tuesday.】

item.title: ISS 表示，菲利普斯 66 股东应投票支持 Elliott 的四位提名人
item.description: 代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services Inc.【原文：Shareholders of Phillips 66 should vote for all four board candidates nominated by activist investor Elliott Investment Management in its upcoming annual meeting, said proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services Inc.】

item.title: 日本股市将因中美关税减让而上涨
item.description: 在中美两国同意大规模降低关税、日元走低并提振全球股市之后，日本股市将延续连胜势头。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to extend their winning streak after the US and China agreed to a massive de-escalation in tariffs, sending the yen lower and boosting global equities.】

item.title: 卢拉与习近平签署新协议，巴西摆脱特朗普的贸易威胁
item.description: 巴西最大的两个贸易伙伴正在发动贸易战，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）坚称，他不想在美国和中国之间做出选择。但越来越清楚的是，如果逼不得已，他会选择哪一边。【原文：Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva insists he doesn’t want to pick between the US and China as his two largest trading partners wage a trade war. But it’s increasingly clear which side he’d choose if forced.】

item.title: 美国努力受阻，TikTok、Meta 在亚洲仍面临严厉限制
item.description: 试图遏制 TikTok、Instagram 和 Snapchat 的一些最严厉的新法律并非来自华盛顿或布鲁塞尔。它们来自堪培拉、雅加达和吉隆坡等首都。【原文：Some of the toughest new laws attempting to rein in TikTok, Instagram and Snapchat aren’t coming from Washington or Brussels. They’re emerging from capitals such as Canberra, Jakarta and Kuala Lumpur.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司在股价下跌后将支付 21 亿美元股息
item.description: 在贸易战造成经济不确定性和油价下跌的背景下，巴西国有石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）批准的股息略低于预期。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petrobras approved dividends slightly below expectations amid a trade war that has created economic uncertainty and undermined oil prices.】

item.title: 个人所得税、小费和汽车贷款：美国国会众议院税收法案指南
item.description: 众议院共和党人公布了其庞大的财政法案中的税收条款，为党内领导人认为可能通过的法案提供了至关重要的初步解读，这也是意见不一的共和党立法者们数周紧张谈判的高潮。【原文：House Republicans’ release of the tax provisions in their massive fiscal bill provides a crucial initial reading of what party leaders think could pass, culminating weeks of intense negotiations among fractious GOP lawmakers.】

item.title: Coinbase 股价因纳入 S&P 500 指数而大涨
item.description: 在S&P道琼斯指数（S&P Dow Jones Indices）表示该公司将在5月19日开盘前加入S&P 500指数后，Coinbase Global股价在盘后交易中大涨6%。【原文：Coinbase Global shares jumped 6% in postmarket trading after S&P Dow Jones Indices said the company will join the S&P 500 Index before trading opens May 19.】

item.title: 中美停战可能避免经济衰退，但不会导致经济放缓
item.description: 预测人士说，特朗普政府与中国达成的临时贸易协议未能及时阻止美国经济放缓，即使它降低了今年晚些时候美国经济全面衰退的风险。【原文：The Trump administration’s temporary trade deal with China didn’t arrive in time to prevent a slowdown in the US economy, forecasters say, even if it reduces the risk of a full-blown recession later this year.】

item.title: 中美贸易战停战，S&P 500 指数跃升逾 3
item.description: 周一，美国股市飙升至一个多月以来的最佳交易时段，原因是在全球最大的两个经济体同意暂时降低彼此商品的关税后，华盛顿和北京之间的贸易紧张局势得到缓解，投资者对此感到高兴。【原文：US stocks soared to their best session in more than a month on Monday, as investors cheered easing trade tensions between Washington and Beijing after the world’s two largest economies agreed to temporarily reduce tariffs on each other’s goods.】

item.title: 萨克斯聘请 Kirkland & Ellis 和 PJT 探讨融资方案
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）已邀请 PJT Partners、Kirkland & Ellis 和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Saks Global Enterprises tapped PJT Partners, Kirkland & Ellis and Bank of America Corp. to help it explore ways to raise new financing alongside the asset-based loan it is pursuing, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 众议院减税计划 "未触及 "小额债券免税问题
item.description: 在众议院税务撰稿人周一公布的一项法案中，支撑市政债券的关键性联邦补贴似乎毫发无损，这让公共财政游说者和银行家们松了一口气。【原文：Public finance lobbyists and bankers breathed a sigh of relief as the key federal subsidy underpinning municipal bonds appeared unscathed in a bill House tax writers released Monday.】

item.title: 众议院计划大幅提高哈佛、耶鲁捐赠税
item.description: 共和党立法者提议大幅提高美国最富有大学的税收，扩大了特朗普政府与精英高等教育之间的斗争。【原文：Republican lawmakers proposed to significantly increase taxes on the richest US universities, broadening a fight between the Trump administration and elite higher education.】

item.title: 美国共和党将逐步取消拜登清洁能源信贷，为减税买单
item.description: 众议院共和党人提议取消对电动汽车的税收减免，并逐步取消对清洁能源生产的激励措施，以帮助支付唐纳德-特朗普总统的大规模税收方案。【原文：House Republicans are proposing to eliminate a tax credit for electric vehicles and phase out incentives for the production of clean energy to help pay for President Donald Trump’s massive tax package.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省冻结工业碳税以帮助企业应对关税对经济的冲击
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省正在冻结其工业碳税，以帮助在美国关税影响下苦苦挣扎的企业，这可能会给首相马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的政府带来挑战。【原文：Alberta is freezing its industrial carbon tax in a bid to help companies struggling with the effects of US tariffs, potentially setting up a challenge to the government of Prime Minister Mark Carney.】

item.title: 交易员在半导体基金暴涨 24% 前抛售杠杆基金
item.description: 上周，ETF 投资者退出了对半导体的看涨押注，而在此之前，由于华尔街对中美贸易休战欢呼雀跃，半导体行业出现了数月来最大幅度的单日反弹。【原文：ETF investors exited bullish bets on semiconductors last week, just before the sector staged one of its sharpest one-day rebounds in months as Wall Street cheers a US-China trade truce.】

item.title: 州人工智能监管禁令被纳入共和党税收和财政法案
item.description: 一个强大的众议院委员会在唐纳德-特朗普总统的大规模税收和支出法案中加入了防止各州监管人工智能的措辞，此举将使美国许多最大的科技和人工智能公司受益。【原文：A powerful House committee has tucked language preventing states from regulating artificial intelligence into President Donald Trump’s massive tax and spending bill, a move that would benefit many of the US’s largest tech and AI companies.】

item.title: 阿特金斯说，美国证券交易委员会的加密货币经纪商规则可能会得到全面修订
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周一表示，允许经纪人担任数字资产托管人的框架可能需要被废除和取代，他还补充说，对冲基金可能被授权持有自己的加密货币。【原文：A framework that enables brokers to act as custodians for digital assets may need to be repealed and replaced, Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Paul Atkins said Monday, adding that hedge funds could be given authority to hold their own crypto.】

item.title: 苹果计划在 iOS 19 中为设备提供人工智能驱动的电池管理模式
item.description: 苹果公司正计划利用人工智能技术来解决客户经常感到沮丧的问题：iPhone 的电池寿命。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning to use artificial intelligence technology to address a frequent source of customer frustration: the iPhone’s battery life.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克认为有理由再次降息，但敦促谨慎行事
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克在支持进一步降低借贷成本的同时，也敦促各方保持谨慎。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks urged for caution even as he backed a further reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 惠誉上调阿根廷债务评级，为 Milei 带来新助力
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）提高了阿根廷的信用评级，理由是该国取消了货币管制，并成功获得了多边资金。【原文：Argentina’s credit score was raised by Fitch Ratings, citing the country’s move to dismantle currency controls and its success in securing multilateral funding.】

item.title: 货运下滑后，法国航运巨头盛赞中美协议
item.description: 全球第三大集装箱承运商法国达飞轮船公司（CMA CGM SA）首席执行官鲁道夫-萨德（Rodolphe Saade）对华盛顿和北京之间的贸易战休战表示欢迎。【原文：Rodolphe Saade, Chief Executive Officer of CMA CGM SA, the world’s third-largest container carrier, hailed a truce in the trade war between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 在中国降税之前，美国 4 月关税收入猛增
item.description: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统寻求与目标国家达成贸易协议的努力可能会使未来的关税收入减少，但美国 4 月份的关税收入创下了历史新高，帮助限制了预算赤字的进一步扩大。【原文：The US collected a record amount of revenue from tariffs in April, helping to limit a further widening of the budget deficit, though President Donald Trump’s search for trade deals with targeted nations may scale back future amounts collected.】

item.title: 欧盟高官警告：意大利拒绝ESM增加了风险因素
item.description: 意大利高层官员警告说，由于意大利未能批准欧洲稳定机制救助基金，一旦未来发生银行业危机，该集团将失去更多保护。【原文：Italy’s failure to ratify the European Stability Mechanism bailout fund leaves the bloc with less protection in case of a future banking crisis, top officials warned.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行股价创 14 年新高，市值超越意大利联合信贷银行
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的股价周一升至 14 年来的新高，市值超过竞争对手意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA），成为意大利最大的银行。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s share price rose to a 14-year high on Monday, lifting its market capitalization past rival Intesa Sanpaolo SpA to make it Italy’s largest bank by that metric.】

item.title: 世界银行认为，如果取消进口禁令，尼日利亚的收入将激增
item.description: 世界银行表示，取消尼日利亚的高关税和进口禁令可大幅增加这个非洲人口最多国家的税收。【原文：Lifting Nigeria’s high tariffs and import bans could significantly increase tax revenue for Africa’s most populous country, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 英国央行泰勒敦促大幅降息后警告 "危险的 "贸易威胁
item.description: 英国央行决策者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）表示，利率距离摆脱限制性水平还有 "很长的路要走"，并警告唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战会带来 "危险 "威胁。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Alan Taylor said interest rates are still a “long way” from moving out of restrictive levels, warning of the “perilous” threat from Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 嘉年华利用新发行的 10 亿美元债券为更多债务再融资
item.description: 嘉年华公司（Carnival Corp. ）今年第三次发行债券，因为该邮轮运营商正在削减在科威德-19 大流行病期间膨胀的债务负担。【原文：Carnival Corp. is issuing bonds for the third time this year, as the cruise operator chips away at a debt load that had ballooned during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: ESM总裁称市场对美元的疑虑是欧盟的机会
item.description: 一位欧盟高层决策者表示，该地区应利用投资者对美元和美国国债的疑虑。【原文：A top European Union policymaker said the region should take advantage of investor doubts in the dollar and US Treasuries.】
